alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 7:11AM CST until February 20 at 11:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay River At Enterprise. * WHEN...From this morning to late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water beginning to overflow banks from the confluence of Chunky River and Okatibbee Creek to approximately 3 miles downstream. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 23.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 28.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Chickasawhay River Enterprise 25.0 23.4 Fri 6 am CST 28.4 27.0 21.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CST.
